title: shuddha shakti Om
sahitya:
shuddha shakti Om shubham ena jyOti kIrtanAnjali sheivOm


anupallavi

  mutti vanattil pUttu maNakkum bhakti jnAna karma malarAl


caraNam    karuNai anbum kAdal inbum kavalaiyaTra vAzhvum
iru vikAram aTra naTpum idaya dhyAna oLiyum
maruviya mAndar dEvarAgi mAsillAda ulagil
aruLarasu nilava saccidAnandamayam kulavip-poliya
